reviews.review_msg: Horrible professor teaching a graduate-level course. I feel like she is not qualified to teach a graduate-level course. She is not organized, the only thing she cares about is formatting. In class, she picks her favorites, if you raise any opinion that is against her idea, be prepared to get a B or C.

Susan was a caring professor and approachable however it was a lot of work for a 2 credit course.  Professor Doig did not give feedback to your assignments prior to the next assignments being due so there was no opportunity to gain insight on whether you were on the right path or not.  Class discussions did not complement the course material.
